definitions.definition: A wine made primarily from or exclusively from a single variety of grape, which carries the name of that grape.
examples: The varietal Merlot has rich red color and a robust fruity taste. Cabernet Sauvignon is a varietal that descended from Cabernet Franc and Sauvignon Blanc.

definitions.definition: A coffee made primarily from or exclusively from a single variety of coffee bean.

main_definition: A wine made primarily from or exclusively from a single variety of grape, which carries the name of that grape.
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) A coffee made primarily from or exclusively from a single variety of coffee bean.
